text: Red Hat Enterprise Linux (RHEL) is a Linux distribution developed by Red Hat for the commercial market. Red Hat Enterprise Linux is released in server versions for x86-64, Power ISA, ARM64, and IBM Z and a desktop version for x86-64. All of Red Hat's official support and training, together with the Red Hat Certification Program, focuses on the Red Hat Enterprise Linux platform. == Related pages == * Red Hat ==References== ==Further reading== * * * * * * * * * Red Hat Developer Toolset * Red Hat Software Collections ==Other websites== * * Brian Stevens, CTO and vice president of engineering, Red Hat on why Red Hat Enterprise Linux is "The Business OS for Flexibility and Value" * Category:Red Hat Category:X86-64 Linux distributions
title: Red Hat Enterprise Linux
